abstract: Another big sell-off in Asia and more modest declines in European markets preceded the downturn in the United States.
snippet: Another big sell-off in Asia and more modest declines in European markets preceded the downturn in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The fallout from last week’s global stock dive showed few signs of letting up yesterday, as markets from Hong Kong to New York deepened their losses.

headline.main: Shares Continue to Sink, From Hong Kong to New York
headline.print_headline: Shares Continue to Sink, From Hong Kong to New York

byline.original: By Jeremy W. Peters and Heather Timmons
